name: HotwireFision
0:
”Alexa, tune to CNN”
”Alexa, show me movies with Will Smith”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Alexa lets you control your Fision TV set top box with voice commands. Tell Alexa to change the channel by call letter or number; search for shows, movies by titles or actors; open up the Recordings, Menu or Guide; play, pause or rewind the current show

Try saying:
“Alexa, tune to CNN.”
“Alexa, show me movies with Will Smith.”
“Alexa, find Modern Family.”
"Alexa, play The Big Bang Theory"
“Alexa, pause.”
"Alexa, play."
“Alexa, rewind”
“Alexa, go to Settings.”
“Alexa, go to DVR.”
"Alexa, open Guide"
"Alexa, go to On Demand"
